LanguageData.glwCompleteStartupLetterDesc: Your launch window closes in {0}.\n\nIf you do not launch before the end of the launch window, then you will have to complete the warm-up sequence again.
LanguageData.glwMissedLaunchLetterDesc: You have missed your launch window. The grav engine will now need to cool off for {0} before you can initiate the warm-up sequence again.
LanguageData.glwMissedLaunchLetterDesc2: You have missed your launch window. You will need to complete the warm-up sequence again before you can launch.
LanguageData.glwEjectedLaunchLetterDesc: You have aborted a gravlaunch warm-up sequence. The grav engine will now need to cool off for {0} before you can initiate the warm-up sequence again.
LanguageData.glwLaunchTimersResetDesc: Your grav engine has finished cooling down after a missed launch window. You can now initiate the warm-up sequence again.
